title: saved logins being displayed without being asked to login with system password
content: Just noticed, this AM, that when I was accessing saved logins screen it was showing the password without being asked to login using the system password. Why is that happening and how do I fix it?
creator: arejfour

title: Help please! Bookmarks lost and no restore file of bookmarks kept
content: Please let me know how I can get my old bookmarks as I do not have any on file in the restore area the only ones I have are five teen year old ones, Can you please help me restore them to the my original ones?
creator: filipsali

title: Firefox closes pin tabs on quit
content:
When I pin a tab, then quit Firefox, the pin is lost forever.

Most other tickets I've seen are about restoring them, but I'm looking for some setting to change so that I can pin tabs.

My history is set to: Remember My setting to delete all cookies and site data on close is unchecked

Any ideas?


Thanks a million!
creator: joshua.himmens

title: Pinch to zoom in Linux(Ubuntu) platform
content:
Hello,

I use my laptop's touchpad for zooming but it acts just like Ctrl + "+" or Ctrl + "-" and changes the whole webpage. I want to zoom in smoothly so that only that part of the screen gets enlarged (like zooming an image on touchscreen). I looked on the internet and found that it can be done by turning "apz.allow_zooming" to true from about:config but it was already set to true. I use the latest Firefox version on Ubuntu 20.04 (tried 22.04 also and wayland too). Can you please help how I can enable pinch to zoom in firefox?
creator: ravijks

title: strange emails showing up in login screen
content: When I visit Hulu.com some strange emails appear along with legitamite emails, but ones I have never used on the Hulu site. Is there a way to remove them?
creator: joshuadharris1985

title: media player codec
content:
I have a php file with an html video tag which recently stopped working in Firefox Developer Edition (FDE). It still works in other browsers. In FDE, the volume is permanently muted. I can't find a way to turn mute off. In About:Config under Media: there are messages at

media.decoder-doctor.new-issue-endpoint = https://webcompat.com/issues/new

and

media.decoder-doctor.notifications-allowed = MediaWMFNeeded,MediaWidevineNoWMF,MediaCannotInitializePulseAudio,MediaCannotPlayNoDecoders,MediaUnsupportedLibavcodec,MediaPlatformDecoderNotFound

title: Cannot store past history and frequently used sites.
content: I have lost the abilty to save any history and store commonly used sites. For instance, I have to login into Outlook every time I switch on my laptop.
creator: david.allen.13

title: Emails
content: On Friday 3rd June there was an update on Firefox Since that time I have not been able to open any attachments on my Windows Live Mail. I have never ever had this problem before It has been established that the problem is with Firefox I need this problem to be fixed as soon as possible please I have tried many ways but no luck at all. Please answer in easy to understand answers, as when I have looked on Google they are very complicated Thankyou With Regards Carol
creator: angelflower2105

title: Can't retrieve my original Firefox account
content: My hard drive became corrupted. I got a new hard drive. I entered my email for my Firefox account and then my password. I was sent a verification code. I entered the code. Fiefox said the password was incorrect but sent me another verification code and again told me my password was incorrect. This process would repeat over and over again. I can't get into my account. I need my bookmarks and passwords. What is going on. Firefox even saved the account email and password when I entered it. I will quit using this browser if I can't get my account back. I don't trust Firefox anymore. Thanks
creator: david-bozzi

title: How to disable the Shift F to open developer tools?
content:
Currently using 101.0 (64 bit) on Windows 10.

It's quite annoying to try to type a capital F using Shift F but end up with developer mode.

I tried in privacy mode and this still occcurs, so I think it's not something my add-ons do.

Is there any way to disable this feature?
creator: Plow1073

title: Extension data is gone (being reset) after some time
content: I wasn't using Firefox for a month and now when I open it all my extensions seem to be reset. All the data are gone, Note is empty, OneTab is empty, Bitwarden is logged out. The Firefox account and websites are still logged in. I didn't click anything like refresh data. What could be the issue and is my data still recoverable?
creator: skygate
